line_1: "What! is this story all thine own invention?"
line_2: Or hear thee say, as grew thy roused attention,

line_1: With Judgment fraught, and rare Invention
line_2: And modern Plays, that I could mention,

line_1: With Judgment fraught, and rare Invention
line_2: Are wrote with much the same Intention;
And those ingredients I shall mention,
I'm sure will answer my intention.
